title: Six Deals You Need To Know About In Australia Today
text:
Image: Supplied

G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: 51% off new sneaker styles, 30GB mobile data for $10, cheap MSI Gaming Laptops and more!

1. 78% off Royal Comfort 800GSM Quilts: eBay is having a sale on deluxe Royal Comfort quilts right now with 78% off - down from $199 to just $49.95! Click here.

2. 56% off new sneakers: Catch is having a sale on sneakers including new styles from Adidas, ASICS, Converse, Nike, Reebok and more. Click here!

3. Cheap laptop backpacks with inbuilt charging: Amazon has knocked 54% off the Wisher Travel Laptop Backpack. The backpack is suitable for 15.6-inch laptops, waterproof and comes with inbuilt USB charging - not bad for $16.95. Click here!

4. 60% off appliances: eBay and Catch have teamed up to offer up to 60% off home appliances via the latter's official eBay store. Discounted products include juicers, air fryers, blenders, bread makers and coffee machines. Click here!

5. Cheap gaming laptop: Amazon is selling the MSI GL63 8RCS-060 15.6" Gaming Laptop (Intel Core i5-8300H, NVIDIA GTX1050, 8GB, 256GB Nvme SSD, Win10) for under $889.96. There's also a $44.44 delivery change, but you can have that waived by joining Amazon Prime's free trial. Not bad at all! Click here.

6. 30GB mobile data for $10: Amaysim has slashed the price of its $30 SIM-only plan to ten bucks. The deal is available until September 30 and you need to use the discount code 'SAVE20'. Here are the inclusions:

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
description: G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: 51% off new sneaker styles, 30GB mobile data for $10, cheap MSI Gaming Laptops and more!...
